SEARCH
Package pegasus.tensor

Class Tensors

java.lang.Object
pegasus.tensor.Tensors
public final class Tensors extends Object
Contains tensor utilities.

      public static double factorial(double n)

      Parameters:
      n - The number to get the factorial of
      Returns:
      The factorial of n

    • factorialExact

      public static long factorialExact(long n)
      Calculates the exact integer factorial of the provided input n. Note that this requires a non-negative input. Values over 20 will trigger an integer overflow.
      Parameters:
      n - The number to get the factorial of
      Returns:
      The factorial of n

    • rotate

      public static Vector3 rotate(Vector3 v, Quaternion q)
      Rotates the provided vector v by the provided rotation quaternion q.
      Parameters:
      v - The vector of which to rotate
      q - The rotation quaternion of which to apply to the provided vector v
      Returns:
      The rotated vector
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When either the provided vector v or the provided rotation quaternion q is null

    • slerp

      public static Quaternion slerp(Quaternion start, Quaternion end, double t)
      Performs spherical linear interpolation (SLERP) between two quaternions. This assumes that the input quaternions are already normalized.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting quaternion
      end - The end quaternion
      t - The interpolation parameter t (0-1)
      Returns:
      The interpolated quaternion
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When a null parameter is provided

    • to2D

      public static Vector2 to2D(Vector3 v, double focalLength)
      Translates a 3D coordinate into a 2D coordinate using the provided focal length. This operation inverts the Y coordinate.
      Parameters:
      v - The vector of which to translate
      focalLength - The focal length to use in the translation
      Returns:
      The translated coordinate
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided vector v is null
      See Also:
      • to2D(Vector3, double, boolean)

    • to2D

      public static Vector2 to2D(Vector3 v, double focalLength, boolean invertY)
      Translates a 3D coordinate into a 2D coordinate using the provided focal length.
      Parameters:
      v - The vector of which to translate
      focalLength - The focal length to use in the translation
      invertY - Whether to invert the Y axis
      Returns:
      The translated coordinate
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided vector v is null
      See Also:
      • to2D(Vector3, double)

      Parameters:
      v - The vector of which to convert into a tuple
      Returns:
      The converted tuple
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided vector v is null

    • toLayeredTuple

      public static Tuple<DoubleTuple> toLayeredTuple(Matrix m)
      Converts the provided matrix m into a layered tuple.
      Parameters:
      m - The matrix of which to convert into a layered tuple
      Returns:
      The converted tuple
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - When the provided matrix m is null
